summary: This document is an email chain from June 2021 where an individual named Pam Mbatani expresses confusion and concern after receiving a court order related to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. She denies any knowledge or involvement with them and requests the order to forward to her US lawyer.

persons.name: Pam Mbatani
persons.context: Author of an email expressing confusion about receiving a court order related to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, denies any knowledge or involvement with them.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in the subject of a court order that was received by Pam Mbatani, referred to alongside Ghislaine Maxwell in a 'horrific story'.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned in the subject of a court order that was received by Pam Mbatani, referred to alongside Jeffrey Epstein in a 'horrific story'.

events.title: Initial query about court order
events.description: An unnamed individual receives and queries a court order related to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, expressing confusion as they claim to have never met them.

events.title: Pam Mbatani's response to court order
events.description: Pam Mbatani responds to the query, stating she knows nothing about the matter, requests the court order to forward to her US lawyer, and emphasizes the recipient was not involved in what happened to her.

keyFacts: A court order related to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell was sent to an individual (Pam Mbatani) who claims to have no knowledge or involvement with them.
Pam Mbatani denies ever meeting Jeffrey Epstein or Ghislaine Maxwell and expresses confusion about why she received the court order.
Pam Mbatani requests the court order to forward to her lawyer in the United States, indicating potential legal proceedings or inquiries involving her.
The correspondence suggests the court order may have been misdirected or that individuals unrelated to the case are being contacted in relation to it.
